ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Skeleton Man, while trying to save a Lost Soul, is stuck in a Limbo of Despair and Sorrow! Now both of them must discover a way to escape this place of horrors while Jon fights his own Private Demons or spend eternity trapped in this Dark Afterlife!
